song.title: Praise to you
song.lyrics:
[C] Praise to you, let me sing of your love, Spirit of fire, my Lord. Glory to you, the world is full of your light: Gloria, alleluia.
[V1] Spirit, come! Pour out your rays of light, Let them fill me with your love. Come to me, come quickly, come visit my soul; Spirit, come! Enter my heart!
[V2] Spirit, come! Precious gift from on high, Come console me with your love. Come and cure the wounds of my soul, heal me Lord; Spirit, come! Enter my heart!
[V3] Spirit, come! Wash away all my fears, Fill me with new life in You. Clear the path before me, keep me from all sin; Spirit, come! Enter my heart!
[V4] Spirit, come! Holy fire from above, Come and change my heart of stone. Make it burn with love for You, Spirit of truth; Spirit, come! Enter my heart!
[V5] Spirit, come! Come and give me your peace, Take my life, set me ablaze, Fill me with your joy, let me sing to your name; Spirit, come! Enter my heart!
